articles.title: Toronto hate crime report: Jews most targeted group, anti-Asian incidents on the rise - CP24 Toronto's Breaking News
articles.description: The number of hate crimes in Toronto reported to police rose again in 2021, a year that saw the Jewish community as the most targeted group and a significant increase in anti-Asian incidents.
